ygData.msgSnippet: In regard to monks, they have a penalties to their AC if the weighs goes above 15lbs.  It is also their bonus because each lvl they go up their AC goes up also
ygData.messageBody:
In regard to monks, they have a penalties to their AC if the weighs goes
above 15lbs. It is also their bonus because each lvl they go up their AC
goes up also by a lot. It is one of the reason I stop playing a monk. I
have to throw away all my loot if I want to be in top shape.

I am glad that I did because Bard Rocks!!!!

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard,
Hammerpaw and Samiam

Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Bard...


From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

The main reason I don't advocate increasing Str is based on some Monk
research that seems to confirm that increased weight regardless of str
adversely affects the dodge skill to a great degree. therefore wearing the
best lightest armor may help you totally avoid a blow that would otherwise
hit you for reduced damage in heavier armor.

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Well here are my thoughts...
>
> Put 10 in Dex, 5 in Int, and the rest in Agi

This is an almost religious topic among bards, but in my opinion, put all
the
points you can into strength. Someday, if you are like most bards, you will
want to wear plate, and if you have 70 strength, forget about wearing even
banded mail.

Jyzan
